jobDescription: ABOUT ONE ONE is a global campaign and advocacy organization backed by over nine million people from around the world who are committed to the fight against extreme poverty and preventable disease, particularly in Africa. We hold world leaders to account for the promises made to the poorest, and we press them to support better policies and aid that is more effective. We also work with leaders in Africa to support greater democracy, accountability and transparency so that these resources can be effectively deployed. We operate from Abuja, Berlin, Brussels, Johannesburg, London, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Rotterdam and Washington DC.  ONE’s members are critical to this work. They come from every walk of life and from across the political spectrum. They’re artists and activists, faith and business leaders, students and scientists. They take action day in, day out— organizing, mobilizing, educating, and advocating so that people will have the chance not just to survive, but to thrive. ABOUT THE OPPORTUNITY Employees of ONE work in a collaborative and creative environment towards reaching a common goal of ending extreme poverty and preventable disease. When you work for ONE, you will receive an exceptional benefits package along with the opportunity to contribute to worldwide causes impacting those most in need.  TheAssistant Marketing Data Analyst is an entry-level role thatwill help the entire Global Marketing Division innovate and increase our impact through the effective collection, analysis and reporting of marketing data and analytics to inform strategy. The Assistant Marketing Data Analyst will assist the Associate Data Analyst and Marketing Director in handling a wide range of data related to performance and testing across ONE’s marketing and supporter communications. The ideal candidate will have an educational background and some work experience in marketing analytics (including social media, e-mail or web), statistical analysis and/or databases. This is a full-time, non-exempt opportunity reporting directly to the Marketing Director sitting on the Marketing Planning& Insights subteam. This position is based in Washington, DC.
